name: PURGE (itch) (Rona Hattingh)
description:
"What am I doing here?"

That is the question Britney, a survivor,  asks herself several times during the mission she accepted from a dying soldier. A crucial mission in the battle to stop aliens from invading Earth.

Help Britney to purge the sewer system of her city from 6 alien queens waiting to be born. 

HOW TO PLAY?

Movement - WASD

Jump - SPACE

Run - LEFT SHIFT

Action - E

Map - M

Pause Menu - P

CREDITS:

Thank you to all the artists who contributed to this game.

MUSIC 

"Combat #2" by Andy Ray

SFX 

"The Ultimate Sounds FX Album" by Sidearm Studios

3D ASSETS 

  • "Creature Props" & "PBR Military Pack" by Maksim Bugrimov
  • "FPS Horror Essentials" by RRFreelance/ Pixelburner
  • "Human Females Pack" - StudioNewPunch
  • "Yughues Free Bombs" - Nobiax Yughues

2D ASSETS

"Painted UI" by Soti

VFX

"Fire and Fog" & "Water and Blood" -  Alessandro "Neat Wolf" Salvati

TO THE PLAYER...

Thank you for playing my game, hope you enjoy it!

Lots of love,

Rona Hattingh
